attributes.action: introduce legislation to prevent the media from refering to overweight and obese people in offensive terms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am horrified today (13/03/09) to read in the Daily Star newspaper a headline using the word "Fattie" to refer to a person that is overweight or obese.

I feel that it is inappropriate for any media organisation to use terminology that could cause offense to refer to a section of the population, be that due to the race, gender, sexuality or indeed their weight.
